author: Kirstie Pham
comment: Even my husband was impressed and it takes a lot to impress him. My problem is that it's hard to exit out of because it all swipes to the next tab. Regardless it is great for an early tech.
title: Great app

author: Antonio Mangano
comment: This Lunar Phase Application For My ALCATEL ANDROID SMARTPHONE IS ABSOLUTELY PERFECT APPLICATION IT'S ABSOLUTELY ACCURATE AS SEEING FROM MY CURRENT LOCATION I DEFINITELY GIVE YOU 5 STARS *****
title: Lunar Phase Application

author: Ted Miller
comment: Forget the watch face. The value here is the INCREDIBLY detailed app. Best moon and sun gazing app ever.
title: Forgettable face, amazing mind

author: Leane Laken
comment: Great app for keeping up with lunar movements. Great support from developer too.
title: Great app
